name: Oduwa Coin
description: OduwaCoin is a free open source project derived from collaborative blockchain Mirror of Bitcoin, PPCoin and NovaCoin with the goal of providing a long-term energy-efficient scrypt-based crypto-currency. Built on the foundation of Hybrid Blockchain POW/POS, innovations such as proof-of-stake help further advance the field of crypto-currency and boosting nearly NO-transaction fees for all users.
